register.reg_long_name: Debug OS Lock Data Transfer Register, Transmit
register.reg_condition: when EL1 is capable of using AArch32

purpose_text.para: Used for save/restore of DBGDTRTXint. It is a component of the Debug Communication Channel.

field_description.para: Reads of this register return the value in DTRTX and do not change TXfull.
Writes of this register update the value in DTRTX and do not change TXfull.
For the full behavior of the Debug Communications Channel, see .

access_permission_text.para: Arm deprecates reads and writes of DBGDTRTXext through the System register interface when the OS Lock is unlocked, DBGOSLSR.OSLK == 0.

ps.name: MRC
MCR
